name: ROPE & KNOT LIGHT
description:
All tied up.

This brass & linen rope pendant lamp casually knots up on a wall or can be stung from the ceiling using the included solid maple ball. Wrap it. Knot it. Basically hang it. Both versatile and tough this plug-in bulb lamp installs anyway you like. 

Plug-in lamp includes 10' of rope cord, raw brass lamp body, 40watt clear globe light, vintage style plug, solid maple ball hanger with installation hardware.

*CURRENTLY PREORDER (three week lead time before shipment)


Hardwired pendant version also available. 
Includes 48" of rope cord,  raw brass lamp body, 40watt clear globe light and custom brass ceiling canopy.

name: LEATHER + BRASS HEXAGON PULLS
description:
Gorgeous pair of natural leather cabinet pull handles with brass hexagon hardware detail. Handmade with heavy duty 8oz leather and reinforcing brass eyelets allows for these to easily withstand daily use and rough handling while still looking great for decades to come. Leather is finished with a hand rubbed oil treatment that will darken further with use and sun exposure. 

Each handle includes a 1-1/2" bolt to accommodate almost any standard door or drawer thicknesses.

+ Sold as a Pair
+ Free Domestic Shipping

name: SIMPLE LIGHT
description:
Simply designed to be simply amazing. 

Say hello to a modern minimal light fixture that's not your average bulb holder. Can be installed as a ceiling fixture or as a hardwired sconce. Designed to be perfectly streamlined and completely unfussy, the Simple Light is just that. Simple. 

Screw it in and light it up. It's that simple.
 

+ Available finishes include Brass, Black or White. 
+ Fixture dimensions: 5" tall x 5.5" diameter.
+ Hardwired for easy ceiling or wall installation. 
+ Includes 40watt clear globe bulb.
+ Free Domestic Shipping

name: EVERYDAY NECKLACE
description:
Look great. Every. Day.

A perfect minimal necklace for everyday wear. Features a delicate brass chain and a single brass pendant with a surprisingly nice weight and patina. 

Dress it up or down. It goes with everything.


+ 10mm bead style brass pendant on 24" chain. 
+ Lobster clasp closure. 
+ Free domestic shipping

name: RUFFIAN PILLOW
description:
Pretty. Manly. Pillow. 

The Ruffian's olive drab canvas is sourced from vintage army surplus canvas field supplies. This durable canvas has been broken in over decades for supreme comfort and each features a unique blend of vintage over-stitched seams, patches and sewn repairs. With an exposed raw edge surged many times over with black contrasting thread, these guys are made tough and like to be used rough.

+ Pillows include a down filled insert. 
+ Covers can be easily removed and washed. 
+ Dimensions 18" x 18".
+ Free Domestic Shipping

name: LIMITED EDITION : NURSERY PENDANT LIGHT
description: Inspired by the latest Animal Print Shop Nursery Project, this limited edition plug-in pendant light features a 15 foot long soft grey twisted cotton cord, seven lucky and chunky birch wood balls, a warm white metal socket cover and one extra large 5" clear globe blub. Plug it in and hang anyway you please. Includes a handy on/off cord toggle switch to easily turn this baby on wherever you need. Gender neutral natural color palette is stylish for kids of any age. This special limited edition design is available for a limited time only and handmade per order. Custom colors are available, please contact to inquire. + Ships FREE in the USA + 15' cord length with vintage style plug & toggle switch + Wood balls are hand finished with natural bees wax + Includes one extra large 40watt G40 clear globe bulb + Production time of two to three weeks

name: DAILY PILL NECKLACE
description:
An unfussy necklace that goes with just about anything. Features a generously hefty pill style brass pendant sourced from vintage 1970's dead stock. 

Use and abuse as needed. Daily is recommended.


+10mm disc pendant on a 20" antique brass chain. 
+ Includes a lobster clasp.
+ Free domestic shipping
